name: AquaRescue
description:
Description

Your goal is very simple: collect as much trash as possible in 120 seconds ! To do it, swim in the ocean and avoid dangerous animals. Don't forget to rise to the surface to breathe.

More informations

-Min Screen Resolution: 1920x1080p

-Made for the SEAJAM

-This is one of my first game in C++ and my first GameJam. Hope you'll enjoy.
